attributes.additional_details:
i have attached a link outlying the agenda of the above mentioned meeting for you all to read 

http://councillors.halton.gov.uk/ieListDocuments.aspx?CId=292&MId=5801
attributes.background:
halton borough council are planning on closing much needed day care centers, in widnes Ditton Daycare been one and Warrington RD Children center been another. 
There is a meeting to discuss this on Thurday the 14th of July at the municipal buildings in the boardroom (which is not a public meeting)

rejection.details:
The decision to close day care centers appears to be one to be taken by your local council and not the UK Government. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are and how to contact them:
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also contact your local MP about this issue. You can use this page to find out who your local MP is and how to contact them:
 
http://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
